summary.span: 代表具有下拉式清單的選取控制項，且可按一下控制項上的箭頭來顯示或隱藏。

span.span: Represents a selection control with a drop-down list that can be shown or hidden by clicking the arrow on the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 可讓使用者從下拉式清單中選取項目，或 （選擇性） 若要在控制項的文字方塊中輸入新的文字。The allows the user to select an item from a drop-down list or optionally to enter new text in the text box of the control. 是，這表示它可以包含任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或面板） 之物件的集合。 is an , which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. 並屬性會指定如何使用者執行下列其中之一時的行為：The and properties specify how the behaves when the user does one of the following: - 輸入要選取的項目中的字串。Enters a string to select an item in the . - 輸入字串未對應中的項目。Enters a string that does not correspond to an item in the . - 選取 [文字] 方塊中的字串部分。Selects part of the string that is in the text box. - 複製，或將值貼到文字方塊。Copies or pastes a value into the text box. 下表描述使用者可以和，依據的值不能採取的動作和。The following table describes the actions the user can and cannot take, depending on the values of and . || 是 `true` is `true`| 是 `false` is `false`| |-|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | 是 `true` is `true`|-無法選取中的項目輸入字串。- Cannot select an item in the by entering a string.
-無法輸入未對應的字串中的項目。- Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the .
-可以選取在字串的一部分文字方塊。- Can select part of the string in the text box.
-可以複製中的字串文字，但是無法貼上到字串文字方塊。- Can copy the string in the text box, but cannot paste a string into the text box.|-可以選取中的項目輸入字串。- Can select an item in the by entering a string.
-可以輸入未對應的字串中的項目。- Can enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the .
-可以選取在字串的一部分文字方塊。- Can select part of the string in the text box.
-可以複製或貼上中的字串文字方塊。- Can copy or paste the string in the text box.| | 是 `false` is `false`|-可以選取中的項目輸入字串。- Can select an item in the by entering a string.
-無法輸入未對應的字串中的項目。- Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the .
-無法選取在字串的一部分。- Cannot select part of the string in the .
-無法複製或貼上中的字串。- Cannot copy or paste the string in the .|-可以選取中的項目輸入字串。- Can select an item in the by entering a string.
-無法輸入未對應的字串中的項目。- Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the .
-無法選取在字串的一部分。- Cannot select part of the string in the .
-無法複製或貼上中的字串。- Cannot copy or paste the string in the .| 屬性的效果才是`true`。The property has an effect only if is `true`. 是，因此它可以顯示簡單字串以外的內容。The is an , so it can display content other than simple strings. 例如，您可以在其中建立，其中包含一份映像。For example, you can create a that contains a list of images. 當您有在字串以外的內容，因此字串可能會出現在下拉式清單會隱藏時。When you have content other than strings in the , a nonsensical string might appear in the when the drop-down list is hidden. 若要顯示的字串當它包含對非字串的項目時，使用或附加屬性。To display a string in the when it contains non-string items, use the or attached property. ## 自訂 ComboBox 控制項Customizing the ComboBox Control 若要將相同的屬性設定套用至多個控制項，可使用屬性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改預設，讓控制項的獨特的外觀。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 如需有關建立，請參閱 < [ 透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的組件和狀態所特有，請參閱 < [ComboBox 樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/combobox-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [ComboBox Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/combobox-styles-and-templates.md). 此控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值，當控制項出現在應用程式。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式會決定由哪一個桌面佈景主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 預設 WPF 佈景主題](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只能影響該屬性是否都存在於控制項的預設範本，並設定使用。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 您可以找到的視覺化屬性清單中的 「 變更視覺結構的控制項 」 一節[透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立。The following example creates a . 此範例會填入繫結類型的集合物件的屬性`VacationSpots`。The example populates the by binding the property to a collection object of type `VacationSpots`. 此範例也會建立顯示選取的項目。The example also creates a that displays the selected item of the . [!code-xaml[ComboBoxItems#ComboBoxClass](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ComboBoxItems/CSharp/Window1.xaml#comboboxclass)] 下列範例會定義的集合物件，在上述範例中繫結。The following example defines the collection object that the in the preceding example binds to. [!code-csharp[ComboBoxItems#Data](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ComboBoxItems/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#data)] [!code-vb[ComboBoxItems#Data](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ComboBoxItems/VIsualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#data)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks 並屬性會指定如何使用者執行下列其中之一時的行為：The and properties specify how the behaves when the user does one of the following: - 輸入要選取的項目中的字串。Enters a string to select an item in the . - 輸入字串未對應中的項目。Enters a string that does not correspond to an item in the . - 選取 [文字] 方塊中的字串部分。Selects part of the string that is in the text box. - 複製，或將值貼到文字方塊。Copies or pastes a value into the text box. 下表描述使用者可以和，依據的值不能採取的動作和。The following table describes the actions the user can and cannot take, depending on the values of and . || 是 `true` is `true`| 是 `false` is `false`| |-|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | 是 `true` is `true`|-無法選取中的項目輸入字串。- Cannot select an item in the by entering a string.
-無法輸入未對應的字串中的項目。- Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the .
-可以選取在字串的一部分文字方塊。- Can select part of the string in the text box.
-可以複製中的字串文字，但是無法貼上到字串文字方塊。- Can copy the string in the text box, but cannot paste a string into the text box.|-可以選取中的項目輸入字串。- Can select an item in the by entering a string.
-可以輸入未對應的字串中的項目。- Can enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the .
-可以選取在字串的一部分文字方塊。- Can select part of the string in the text box.
-可以複製或貼上中的字串文字方塊。- Can copy or paste the string in the text box.| | 是 `false` is `false`|-可以選取中的項目輸入字串。- Can select an item in the by entering a string.
-無法輸入未對應的字串中的項目。- Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the .
-無法選取在字串的一部分。- Cannot select part of the string in the .
-無法複製或貼上中的字串。- Cannot copy or paste the string in the .|-可以選取中的項目輸入字串。- Can select an item in the by entering a string.
-無法輸入未對應的字串中的項目。- Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the .
-無法選取在字串的一部分。- Cannot select part of the string in the .
-無法複製或貼上中的字串。- Cannot copy or paste the string in the .| 時等於`false`，則會使用以顯示目前選取項目; 當等於`true`、改為使用針對此目的。When is equal to `false`, the uses a to display the currently selected item; when is equal to `true`, a is used for this purpose instead. 請注意，只會顯示純文字，而且可能包含非純文字內容，例如映像。Note that a only displays plain text, and that a may include non-plain text content, such as images. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會建立包含映像做為項目，而不是文字的控制項。The following examples create controls that contain images as items instead of text. 如果屬性設定為`true`，則顯示的映像所傳回的值方法。If the property is set to `true`, the displays the value returned by the image's method. 若要避免有了未預期的文字，使用和屬性，以指定要顯示的文字。To avoid a with unexpected text, use the and properties to assign text to be displayed. [!code-xaml[ComboBoxProps_snip#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ComboBoxProps_snip/CS/pane1.xaml#1)] [!code-xaml[ComboBoxProps_snip#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ComboBoxProps_snip/CS/pane1.xaml#2)] 另一個解決方案是使用屬性。Another solution is to use the property. 下拉式清單控制項的將不會顯示映像，但會顯示您所指派的文字。The drop-down control of the will not display the images but will display the text you assigned. 下列範例示範如何使用 。The following example shows how to use . [!code-xaml[ComboBoxProps_snip#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ComboBoxProps_snip/CS/pane1.xaml#3)]

-無法複製或貼上中的字串。- Cannot copy or paste the string in the .| 時等於`false`，則會使用以顯示目前選取項目; 當等於`true`、改為使用針對此目的。When is equal to `false`, the uses a to display the currently selected item; when is equal to `true`, a is used for this purpose instead. 請注意，只會顯示純文字，而且可能包含非純文字內容，例如映像。Note that a only displays plain text, and that a may include non-plain text content, such as images. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例所示與 可編輯。The following example shows a with an editable . 屬性設定為`true`，因此使用者無法輸入文字插入。The property is set to `true`, so the user cannot enter text into the . span.span: Gets whether the is highlighted.

value.span: 如果 已反白顯示則為 ，否則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是相依性屬性。This property is a dependency property. 不過，相依性屬性識別碼欄位並非公用。However, the dependency property identifier field for is not public. 因此，您無法使用備份相依性屬性，屬性系統作業需要的相依性屬性識別項，例如呼叫。Therefore, you cannot use the backing dependency property for property system operations that require the dependency property identifier, such as calls to . 不過，您仍然可以使用的屬性觸發程序。However, you can still use as a property trigger.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double MaxDropDownHeight { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.MaxDropDownHeight : double with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定下拉式方塊之下拉式清單的最大高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum height for a combo box drop-down.

value.span: 雙精度浮點數 (Double)，表示擷取的高度或要設定的高度。

span.span: A double that represents the height that is retrieved or the height to set.

value.span: 定義至屬性系統的預設值是依據系統最大畫面高度參數三分之一的計算值，但此預設值可能會被各種控制項樣板覆寫。

span.span: The default value as defined to the property system is a calculated value based on taking a one-third fraction of the system max screen height parameters, but this default is potentially overridden by various control templates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自動調整不是預設值，並會在下拉式清單可能超過可用的大小，以父元素的大小。Auto sizing is not the default, and will result in the drop down size potentially exceeding the available size in the parent element. 這不是通常需要。This is not typically desirable. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *double**double* 字串表示法值。String representation of a value. 這會解譯為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]度量。This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement. 字串不需要明確包含小數位數。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. 執行個體的值`1`是可以接受的。For instance a value of `1` is acceptable. 相同套用屬性值一節中所述的範圍限制。The same range restrictions as mentioned in the Property Value section apply. *qualifiedDouble**qualifiedDouble* A*雙*值，如上所述，後面接著一個的下列單位宣告字串： `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。A *double* value as described above, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` 是公釐。1cm==(96/2.54) 像素`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` 為點;1pt==(96/72) 像素`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px `Auto` 啟用自動調整大小行為。Enables autosizing behavior. 請參閱＜備註＞。See Remarks. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的高度控制項的下拉式清單。The following example shows how to use the property to specify the height of the control's drop-down. [!code-xaml[ComboBoxStyles#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ComboBoxStyles/CS/app.xaml#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShouldPreserveUserEnteredPrefix { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShouldPreserveUserEnteredPrefix : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 是否會保留使用者的輸入，或者用符合的項目取代輸入。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the keeps the user's input or replaces the input with a matching item.

value.span: 如果 會保留使用者的輸入，則為 ，如果 用符合的項目取代輸入，則為 。登錄預設值為 。

span.span: if the keeps the user's input; if the replaces the input with a matching item The registered default is .

value.span: 如需有關哪些因素會影響值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

span.span: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，當使用者輸入字串符合其中一個項目在選取的項目，則使用者所輸入的文字取代。By default, when the user types a string into the that matches one of its items, the item is selected and the text that the user typed is replaced. 這會造成使用者輸入來變更大小寫的文字。This can cause the text that the user entered to change case. 如果屬性設定為`true`，則選取相符的項目，但會保留使用者輸入的文字。If the property is set to `true`, the selects the matching item, but preserves the text that the user entered. 例如，假設包含字串"Hello"（以大寫 H），且使用者 （使用小寫的 h) 輸入 "hello"。For example, suppose that a contains the string, "Hello" (with a capital H) and the user enters "hello" (with a lowercase h). 如果已`false`，則選取其集合中的相符項目，而"Hello，"，並於其中填入它以該字串的文字框。If is `false`, the selects the matching item, "Hello," in its collection and populates its text box with that string. 如果是`true`，從集合中，選取"Hello"，但文字方塊會顯示"hello"。If is `true`, "Hello" is selected from the collection, but the text box says "hello." ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

Public Shared ReadOnly ShouldPreserveUserEnteredPrefixProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 取得或設定目前選取之項目的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text of the currently selected item.

value.span: 目前選取之項目的字串。

span.span: The string of the currently selected item.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性是`true`，設定這個屬性會放在文字方塊中輸入的初始文字。When the property is `true`, setting this property places initial text entered in the text box. 當是`false`，設定此值沒有任何作用。When is `false`, setting this value has no effect. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|、 , | ## Examples 此範例示範如何屬性可以用來設定文字插入使用者進行選取之前。This example shows how the property can be used to set text into the before the user makes a selection.
